sprache.help_fdl:
Fastdownload allows the users to download server data like sounds and maps much faster.

For one you can define a default fastdownload server, which will be used for all gameservers. Or you configure a own fastdownload server for each gameserver.

Clicking the SYNC button will tell our webiterface to automaticaly upload all required files to the fastdownload server.

In addition you need to setup the according HTTP URL at the server´s server.cfg or dedicated.cfg.
sprache.neben: FTP Data used for the fastdownload server
